studio.name: Cuba Tattoo Studio
studio.description: Cuba Tattoo Studio is a premium tattoo studio in Albuquerque, New Mexico, founded by Cuban artists attempting to fuse Caribbean passion with avant-garde techniques. With over 177 publications and a community of more than 4,500 followers, the studio has established itself as a benchmark for tattoo art in the Southwest United States.
studio.about: We are a team of verified Cuban artists who believe that every tattoo is a story written on the skin. From vibrant color realism to delicate fine line, our studio offers a personalized experience where trust, communication, and artistic vision come together to create unique and unrepeatable pieces.
studio.philosophy: Every design is born from trust, communication, and a clear artistic vision from the very first line. We don't just do tattoos — we create permanent art that tells your story.

contact.booking: DM on Instagram or call directly

events.name: Valentine's Flash Day
events.description: Special Valentine's event with flash tattoos, matching tattoos for couples, walk-ins welcome, prices starting at $50

events.name: Monthly Promotions
events.description: Rotating offers such as 30% OFF on religious tattoos and other themes

david.bio: Tattoo artist based in Albuquerque, NM. CEO and founder of Cuba Tattoo Studio. Originally from Cuba, David brings the passion and color of the Caribbean to every piece he creates. His philosophy: 'Art is worn on the skin, bro'.
david.styleDescription: David is designated for his mastery of color realism with vibrant palettes and chromatic lighting effects that give life to every piece. His hyperrealistic portraits stand out for their bold use of neon colors, cinematic contrasts, and depth that transforms skin into canvas. Equally skilled in black & grey, his religious and mythological pieces convey striking emotional intensity.
david.signatureStyle: Portraits with neon chromatic lighting, large-scale pieces with vibrant contrasts between light and shadow, and realism that fuses the human with the surreal.

portfolio.description: David's portfolio ranges from female portraits with chromatic lighting in neon and fluorescent tones, to religious pieces in black & grey of cinematic intensity. His cover-ups transform existing tattoos into masterpieces, and his neo-traditional pieces combine skulls, mechanisms, and dark symbolism with a vibrant palette that defies the limits of color on skin.

featuredWorks.title: Chromatic Portrait — Color Realism
featuredWorks.description: Female portrait with neon lighting in turquoise, orange, and fuchsia tones. Every color and shadow has intention — a story built on skin with emotion, strength, and depth.

featuredWorks.title: Painting Transformed into Skin
featuredWorks.description: Piece inspired by a painting that connected deeply with the client. Strong contrasts, dark symbolism, and vibrant colors that fuse the human and the demonic, light and shadow.

featuredWorks.title: Faith in Every Detail — Religious Realism
featuredWorks.description: Christ in black & grey with depth and detail that captures spirituality and emotion. Realism of cinematic level.

featuredWorks.title: Testimonial — Client Gratitude
featuredWorks.description: The best reward: the satisfaction and gratitude of every client. 'I can only say: THANK YOU'.

additionalStyles.description: Full back phoenix in watercolor style with red, orange, and turquoise colors that capture movement and rebirth.
Pieces that combine skulls with golden mechanisms, demons, and steampunk elements in a palette of intense reds and yellows.
Laugh Now Cry Later and catrinas in black & grey with depth and dramatic expressiveness.

nina.role: Specialist in Fine Line, Dotwork & Ornamental
nina.bio: Cuban tattoo artist based in Albuquerque, NM. Nina brings a unique artistic sensitivity to the studio, specializing in delicate designs that combine technical precision with soul and emotion. Her tattoos are born from intuition and connection with each client.
nina.styleDescription: Nina is distinguished by her mastery of fine lines and dotwork, creating designs that are both delicate and powerful. Her mandalas and geometric pieces combine the flower of life with Greek meanders in three-dimensional compositions. Her floral work ranges from ornamental sunflowers to minimalist branches, always with a personal touch that makes each piece unique.
nina.signatureStyle: Mandalas and sacred geometry in blackwork, zodiac designs with celestial elements, minimalist florals with lettering, and freehand tattoos born from creative intuition.

portfolio.description: Nina's portfolio reveals an artist who masters the art of delicate detail. From 3D cubes with Greek meanders over flower of life to zodiac signs with stars and planets, her work spans a spectrum ranging from geometric and structured to organic and fluid. Her floral designs, pet tattoos, and freehand pieces demonstrate versatility that always maintains her distinctive hallmark of elegance and precision.

featuredWorks.title: Sacred Mandala — Blackwork & Dotwork
featuredWorks.description: Tattoos are more than designs — they are balance, energy, and connection. Mandalas remind us that every detail has a purpose.

featuredWorks.title: Pet Footprint — Pet Tattoo
featuredWorks.description: Paw of dog 'Congo' with touch-up after a month. Detailed dotwork honoring the bond with your faithful companion. Nothing more beautiful than seeing how a tattoo heals over time.

featuredWorks.title: Celestial Scorpio — Freehand Fine Line
featuredWorks.description: Freehand zodiac design with Scorpio sign, stars, moons, and planets. Intuitive and organic process — this is how tattoos with soul are born.

featuredWorks.title: Valentine's Special — Love in Ink
featuredWorks.description: Special offers for singles, couples, friends, and family. Because love is also tattooed.

additionalStyles.description: Three-dimensional cube with Greek meanders integrated over a Flower of Life pattern on the nape — architectural precision on skin.
Sunflower framed in diamond composition with ornamental edges in blackwork, combining the botanical with the structural.
Calligraphic typography 'Good Speed' intertwined with wildflowers and daisies in fine line.
Stylized dragon with detailed scales in a style that fuses the ornamental with the mythological.
Organic branch designs with thorns that flow with the body's anatomy.

karli.bio: Cuban artist residing at Cuba Tattoo Studio, Albuquerque, NM. Karli combines exceptional mastery of black & grey realism with versatility ranging from epic Greek mythology to delicate floral designs. Her work is characterized by emotional intensity and meticulous attention to detail.
karli.styleDescription: Karli dominates black & grey realism with an intensity that brings mythological figures like Zeus and Medusa to life, giving them an almost sculptural presence on the skin. Her religious portraits capture spirituality with photographic detail, while her more delicate side is expressed in floral designs, pet portraits, and small pieces proving that versatility and mastery can coexist.
karli.signatureStyle: Greek mythological figures in black & grey with touches of color in the eyes (blue/orange), hyperrealistic animal portraits, and floral sleeves in grayscale with integrated mandalas.

portfolio.description: Karli's portfolio is a testament to versatility within excellence. Her Greek mythology pieces — Zeus with electric blue eyes, Medusa with fiery eyes — are masterpieces of black & grey with selective touches of color. Her mastery extends to realistic pet portraits, ornamental floral designs, pine landscapes, and lettering with celestial elements. Each piece reflects an artist who understands that a great tattoo is born from the fusion of impeccable technique and emotional connection.

featuredWorks.title: Zeus — The Power of Mythology
featuredWorks.description: A powerful design, full of personality, representing tenacity, strength, and courage. Zeus with electric blue eyes and Greek meanders framing the composition.

featuredWorks.title: Floral Mandala — Meaning and Intention
featuredWorks.description: Delicate floral design with much meaning and intention. Mandala with dotwork flowers demonstrating Karli's versatility in softer styles.

additionalStyles.description: Medusa in black & grey with burning orange eyes and detailed snakes — a piece that combines mythological horror with dark beauty.
Portrait of Christ with crown of thorns in black & grey of photographic level, capturing spirituality and suffering with extraordinary detail.
Realistic lion in black & grey with a delicate butterfly perched on its nose — contrast between strength and fragility.
French Bulldog 'Millie' with crown, hyperrealistic portrait capturing the unique personality of each pet.
Hyperrealistic eye surrounded by flowers and tropical leaves — a piece that fuses anatomy with botany.
Forearm sleeve with flowers, mandalas, and ornamental patterns integrated into a cohesive black & grey design.
Pine forest silhouette in black work — natural landscape evoking serenity and connection with nature.
